entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY THIS EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING EAST AROUND 5 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 30 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
